description.originalText:
We had the immense pleasure of having Elina take care of our two children for two years, and I cannot recommend her highly enough. When she started with us, our eldest was 3 years old, and our youngest was just 7 months old. From day one, Elina proved herself to be the perfect mother's hand.

Elina's dedication, warmth, and professionalism are truly unparalleled. She has a natural ability to connect with children, making them feel safe, loved, and entertained. Our eldest child thrived under her care, developing new skills and confidence each day. Elina's gentle and nurturing approach was particularly invaluable with our baby, ensuring a smooth and happy transition through those crucial early months and beyond.

Elina is incredibly reliable and always goes above and beyond to ensure our children are well-cared for and engaged in meaningful activities. Whether it's creative play, educational games, or simply providing a comforting presence, Elina handles it all with grace and enthusiasm. Her attention to detail and proactive attitude gave us peace of mind, knowing that our children were in the best hands possible.

Additionally, Elina's excellent communication and organizational skills made coordinating schedules and discussing our children's progress a breeze. She consistently kept us informed and involved, fostering a strong partnership between us as parents and her as a caregiver.

In short, Elina has been a blessing to our family. Her love, care, and dedication have made a lasting positive impact on our children's lives. We are incredibly grateful for her time with us and wholeheartedly recommend her to any family in need of exceptional childcare.

Thank you, Elina, for everything!

Elina was a wonderful babysitter who worked with us for almost two years. Our two boys at the time were 2.5 and 4 years old. She did an amazing job bonding with them, they loved her. She was always timely, responsible and friendly.
